events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as a Developer position based on your submitted resume and skills.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening call was conducted successfully, where we discussed your background and experience in software development.
Thank you for the detailed responses during the screening; you have expressed interest to proceed with the technical interview.
Your technical interview with our engineering panel has been scheduled for 2024-05-18 at 14:00 UTC.
